# MyCrochetKit - Voice-Activated Crochet Row Counter

> MyCrochetKit is a free, offline-first crochet companion app with voice-activated row counting. Say "next" to count rows while keeping your hands on your hook.

## What is MyCrochetKit?

MyCrochetKit is a modern crochet tracking app designed for active crafters. Unlike pattern databases like Ravelry, MyCrochetKit focuses on the *doing* — helping you track progress while you crochet.

## Key Features

### Voice-Activated Row Counter
- Say "next" to increment your count
- Say "back" to decrement
- Say "reset" to start over
- Works offline via browser speech recognition
- No tapping required — keep your hands on your hook

### PDF Pattern Import
- Upload any PDF pattern
- Automatic parsing into trackable steps
- Step-by-step progress tracking
- Works with any pattern format

### Offline-First
- All data stored locally on your device
- Works without internet connection
- Use at yarn stores, craft circles, anywhere
- Syncs when you're back online

### Multiple Counters
- Track rows and stitches separately
- Multiple counters per project
- Custom increment values
- Target goals with completion alerts

## FAQ

**Is MyCrochetKit free?**
Yes! Core features including voice counting, offline mode, and 25 patterns are free forever.

**Does it work on my phone?**
Yes. MyCrochetKit is a Progressive Web App that works on any modern browser (Chrome, Safari, Edge, Firefox).

**Can I use it offline?**
Yes. All data is stored locally. The app works without internet at yarn stores, craft circles, or anywhere.

**What voice commands work?**
- "next" / "up" / "plus" / "add" - Increment counter
- "back" / "down" / "minus" / "undo" - Decrement counter
- "reset" / "zero" / "clear" - Reset to zero
- "stop" / "pause" - Stop listening
- "add 5" / "minus 3" / "set 47" - Advanced commands

**Is my data private?**
Yes. Data is stored on your device by default. Cloud sync is optional and encrypted.

**How does PDF import work?**
Upload any crochet pattern PDF. MyCrochetKit parses it into individual steps you can track and mark complete.
